name: Panda Smash
description:
Meet Hangri and Fling Fling.

They're two of the last of their kind, and the window to change that is closing fast. Help these famously finicky fornicators save their species!

Objective
  • You have 24 hours to get Fling Fling and Hangri to hook up
How to Play
  • Click an item button to spawn it into the pen
  • Drag an item (or panda) to move it around
  • Try to move items to pandas that need them, or pandas to items they need
  • Once all needs are met, do whatever you can to make those pandas smash!
Tips
  • Leftover items getting in the way? Fling them to the sky to get rid of them
  • Stuck and need to start over? Click the clock (top right) to bring up the restart menu
